name: Ahmed Hassan
title: Full Stack Developer
summary: Passionate Full Stack Developer with 5+ years of experience building scalable web applications using modern technologies. Specialized in Laravel, React, and Vue.js with a strong focus on clean code, performance optimization, and user experience. Proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions for startups and enterprise clients.

responsibilities: Led development of 3 major web applications serving 10,000+ users
Implemented microservices architecture reducing system load by 40%
Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews
Technologies: Laravel, React, PostgreSQL, Docker, AWS
Developed and maintained 15+ client websites and web applications
Optimized database queries improving performance by 60%
Integrated third-party APIs and payment gateways
Technologies: PHP, Laravel, Vue.js, MySQL, Redis
Built responsive websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Collaborated with design team to implement pixel-perfect UIs
Learned Laravel and contributed to team projects
Technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Laravel

education.details: Graduated with honors. Specialized in Software Engineering and Web Development. Completed final project on "E-commerce Platform Development using Laravel".

projects.name: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Full-featured e-commerce platform with admin dashboard, payment integration, and inventory management.

projects.name: Task Management System
projects.description: Collaborative task management tool with real-time updates, team collaboration features, and reporting.
